replies.body:
Sade is absolutely amazing and talented.

And she draws yordles. I'm sold. I hope she gets far.

> [{quoted}](name=Gnarsies,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=QxNgnzOI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-01T18:46:55.658+0000)
>
> Sade is absolutely amazing and talented.
> 
> And she draws yordles. I'm sold. I hope she gets far.

Same!
your {{champion:150}} is AMAZING!!!
Definitely would love to see more art like Gnars with that edge of Realism. Amazing art all around though!
I agree that {{champion:150}} is so good. so i put it as my desktop backround
Hey there. Eager to know what your favorite champion is both to play and/or create art of!

Rumble!  I've probably played 900+ matches with him by now.  I tend to like the "mad genius who tries to be cool but ends up failing miserably" archetype.  And I also like robots.  Tron Bonne from Megaman Legends was my childhood idol, so that was also a thing.
I wish more people played uncommon champions... I get that Rumble is seen in games sometimes, but when's the last time you've seen a Galio that wasn't a bot?..
I see you, Jungle Rumble... lol
...holy crap these are good....
Is this an AMA? If so, why haven't you drawn Syndra yet? Are expectations too high?

> [{quoted}](name=Mansana,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=QxNgnzOI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-01T18:48:49.197+0000)
>
> Is this an AMA? If so, why haven't you drawn Syndra yet? Are expectations too high?

Yup! I'll be doing my best to answer all questions here. At least for champion portraits, my intention is to draw all champions eventually. Syndra is one of those champs that have been requested a bunch, so she'll probably be one of my next ones!
I was in cahoots with Ququroon the whole time, kappa. Can't wait though... Keep up the good work.
Curses!  It all would've went well, if it weren't for that meddling Ququroon.
Can we look forward to seeing any Zed and Syndra shipping drawings? That would be the absolute best! ZedxSyndra is the best couple out there!

I feel that Nizuma Eiji is an inspirations not just for artists but really anyone. Doing the thing that he loves singlemindedly, seeing what others do and being inspired to do even better, and never above spontaneity (well, a little more extreme :P). My drawing skills are mediocre, but reading Bakuman inspired me to strive harder towards being the best and being willing to drop "important" things to the side.

Anyways, I was happy to see that in there, keep up the great art!

Hey Sade, I was at Fanime 2015 this year. I stopped by your booth again because I've been hooked ever since first seeing it but I was wondering why I didn't see some of this artwork at Fanime? Or did I just miss it? Thanks Sade, hope you keep doing what you're doing. (:
Thanks for stopping by my booth!  If the artwork wasn't on sale, then most likely it was contracted/commissioned : )
Oh cool, you're the one that did the Pentakill design for the shirt I got.  I'm hoping J!nx didn't just take the design from you, since I heard some places that sell shirts will sometimes do that.
I've seen the shirt get sold at random places but J!NX definitely owns it!  I had submitted it to a t-shirt design contest of theirs, called "Champs IRL".

> [{quoted}](name=FF Sade,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=QxNgnzOI,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2015-06-01T20:02:06.706+0000)
>
> I've seen the shirt get sold at random places but J!NX definitely owns it!  I had submitted it to a t-shirt design contest of theirs, called "Champs IRL".

You are my inspiration artist.
Level 31 artist right there. That is some amazing detail.
hmm I geuss you could say thats some *next level* drawings there then? Tons of damage. now where is my phreak pun emote rito
Looks like she did tons of work on these {{item:3078}}
Who is that behind Yorick (top left) in the Hexakill: Twisted Treeline piece?
Hecarim{{champion:120}} ? :-)
Ohhh, I see :-)

Ermahgerd! That Pentakill drawing! I have that exact same one on a t-shirt of mine, didn't even know Sade drew that! Now I'm twice as glad to have it! Props to Sade and all her wonderful works! :D 

Btw, Sade, I know you already have her face as one of the buttons, but could you draw a full-body portrait of Ahri? I would love to see one of my favorite champs be drawn by you!! :3
A full size Ahri is something I'd be willing to attempt in the future : )  Thanks for the suggestion!
U R Amazing ^_^
HOW DOES SHE DRAW THOSE BEAUTIFUL NOSES!?I SUCK AT DRAWING NOSES!
love the anime style. would love to see a LoL Manga
you should do a comic on Leona and Diana! Pls
http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/ffsade/sade_doom.png              http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/ffsade/sade_hexakill.jpg      Holy crap, best drawings everrrr
That {{champion:1}} Team pose looks like this:
Can i use gnar as youtube profile pic?
Yup!  All of my non-commissioned works are available for personal use.
Marry Me {{summoner:4}}

I just wanted to come here because I saw the Neil Gaiman shoutout. He's my favorite author. Also, I love your work! If you drew something of Lucian only (or can link the portrait picture by itself at least) I would love to make it my background on the laptop!
Man your art is really cool! I can imagine you going big in the future, your drawings remind me of sonic and megaman crossover form archie comics. Does your inspiration come from anime as well?

I haven't seen the Sonic x Megaman crossover, but I do get inspiration from anime : )   Baccano!, Bleach, Monster, Bakuman, Satoshi Kon films (e.g., Paprika. Perfect Blue), any Hayao Miyazaki film, to name a few.
till i see a darius mid ult axe red about to smash a teemo she is the second best :D{{champion:122}}
What would your comic be about?
When was the image with all the support champions drawn?

The piece was created in August 2012, before champions like Nami, Thresh, and Braum were released.  It's a bit outdated, but there's still room on the table for an updated support wallpaper in the future!
I would love to see {{champion:122}} in your future drawings. The rest of your drawings are tremendously amazing and well-thought out.
These are amazing! Keep up the good work

Sade is an amazing artist and an even more amazing friend!
Couldn't know a cooler person :)
you drew the cover of dunkey's beach blast! i always wanted to find out who made it. You got a new fan!
Just wanted to say I really love your style! Specifically the line-work and foreshortening on the TSM Dyrus piece I find amazing.
